def_en: When there is a stoppage, people stop working because of a disagreement with their employers.

def_cn: (足球等体育运动中的)中断比赛，暂停
def_en: In football and some other sports, when there is a stoppage, the game stops for a short time, for example because a player is injured. The referee may add some extra time at the end of the game because of this.
